title: Christmas Matchups, Covid Outbreak | WHAT’S BURNIN ft. Jamal Crawford | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Christmas Matchups, Covid Outbreak | WHAT’S BURNIN ft. Jamal Crawford | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
WHAT'S BURNIN is back with special guest host Jamal Crawford joining Stak to breakdown ALL of the NBA Christmas day matchups, including Nets vs. Lakers. Plus, they discuss the league COVID issues and answer. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
